Container.Name: headphones
Container.Overview: Headphones(https://github.com/rembo10/headphones) is an automated music downloader for NZB and Torrent, written in Python. It supports SABnzbd, NZBget, Transmission, ÂµTorrent and Blackhole.
Container.Changes:
### 2019-12-19 - Rebasing to alpine 3.11.
### 2019-06-28 - Rebasing to alpine 3.10.
### 2019-05-09 - Add default UTC timezone if user does not set it.
### 2019-03-23 - Switching to new Base images, shift to arm32v7 tag.
### 2019-02-22 - Rebasing to alpine 3.9.
### 2019-01-16 - Add pipeline logic and multi arch.
### 2018-08-18 - Rebase to alpine 3.8.
### 2018-04-03 - Remove forced port and update README.
### 2018-01-05 - Deprecate cpu_core routine lack of scaling.
### 2017-12-12 - Rebase to alpine 3.7.
### 2017-07-20 - Internal git pull instead of at runtime.
### 2017-07-12 - Add inspect commands to README, move to jenkins build and push.
### 2017-05-28 - Add flac package to handle FLAC based .cue.
### 2017-05-25 - Rebase to alpine 3.6.
### 2017-05-03 - Reduce layer, replace broken source for shntool.
### 2017-02-07 - Rebase to alpine 3.5.
### 2016-12-23 - Fix capitalisation in README.
### 2016-09-09 - Add layer badges to README.
### 2016-08-27 - Add badges to README, compile shntool.
### 2016-08-08 - Rebase to alpine linux.
### 2015-07-18 - Inital Release
